attributes.action: Following the abuse scandal of Whorlton Hall, ensure the closure of institutions
attributes.additional_details:
40 people have died within institutions run by the government since 2015. https://news.sky.com/story/pressure-builds-over-deaths-of-people-with-a-learning-disability-or-autism-in-care-11675018

More information regarding recent abuse of people with learning disabilities at Whorton Hall.

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/av/health-48371390/hospital-staff-abused-vulnerable-patients-in-durham-bbc-s-panorama-reveals
attributes.background: The panorama programme reporting abuse occurring in Durham highlighted an important issue ongoing in Britain that seems to get lost with Brexit. It’s important that we value people with learning disabilities as ‘people’ and not abuse, mistreat or degrade. We need change before more abuse occurs....

rejection.details:
